properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 14 at 12:05PM EST until February 15 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 3 to 6 ft expected.

* WHERE...South Santee River to Edisto Beach out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST SATURDAY
